name: Bouncer
description:
Do you like difficulty games? If yes, this game is for you. In 7 levels, you will test your patience and accuracy. You will die a lot.

This game was originally designed for touch devices, but I think, on PC, game is more easier to control it.

Game doesn´t support any controllers, only Mouse and keyboard

Minimum specifications: Everybody can run it

I want add:

  • "Level Completed" screen
  • Weekly or Monthly challanges
  • On-line score tables
  • More levels with a lot of new content

Changelog:

Version 0.4.10 changes:

  • Redesigned options
  • Redesigned levelchoose menu, now with banners
  • Repaired some bugs
